string.text: Is the explosion of '86 your work too?

No, we had nothing to do with that. Most of us were only starting out in science back then. In 1986 it was decided to conduct a series of experiments in block 4 of the reactor. The explosion occurred as a result of several factors: deficiencies in the design of the reactor, the rash decision to conduct experiments on it and the infamous human error, as those on duty at the time made a number of severe mistakes at the critical moment.
What are "death trucks"?

Almost every activity tends to produce waste, especially where a new, unknown path is followed. Unfortunately, at least half the of stalkers die during recruitment. Apparently it's natural selection at work. We believed that you did not pass the recruitment stage and you were therefore selected for scrapping. Right now, we are trying to understand what caused us to make that mistake.
I'm not going to help you in this deception.
Hello, Hawkeye. I think you can get answers to many questions now.
The choice is yours, Hawkeye.
What does the tattoo mean?

S.T.A.L.K.E.R. is an acronym which denotes one of the…taboos, which was to be kept secret by our project. I'm talking about a system for controlling humans. The device itself is located inside the sarcophagus in the power plant and is widely-known as the Monolith. All those who want their wishes to be granted begin to obey our orders. They are marked and given missions. However, some sort of malfunction occurred...for some reason you were instructed to kill yourself.
What happened to me?

You're a bolt that fell out of the machine. Unfortunately, that did not come to our attention for a long time. From the moment the Zone was formed, many people have tried to get to its center but we cannot let that happen. Humanity is not ready for the truth. That is why we recruited stalkers by promising them the fullfillment of their most coveted desires. Once recruited they would be sent to protect the secret of the Zone.
What is the Zone? How did it come about?

What you see before you is the result of an ill-considered intervention in the Earth's noosphere. The inept and chaotic actions of humanity brought about a local crack. The Zone is simply the visible manifestation of this crack. The underlying cause is far greater than you can imagine.
What will happen now?

That depends on you. The Zone is growing. We're trying to restrain its expansion but humanity seems to be intent on hindering our work. Our resources are not limitless and we have spent a lot of them on fighting you. If you join us, we can restrict the Zone's growth. If you decide otherwise, we cannot make a credible prognosis of the future.
Who are you?

I am not alone. We're a group of scientists trying to change the world. According to a theory put forward by Academician Vernadsky, the Earth is surrounded by a special informational field, the so-called noosphere. It includes all the inhabitants of the planet with cognitive abilities. Our main idea was to make small adjustments to the noosphere, allowing us to remove things like anger, cruelty, greed and other negative factors from the planet.
Why did it all happen here?

It was the best place. After the explosion in 1986 there were very few people left in this area and we could work without fear of being found. Further, there were many powerful antennae here, which are extremely important for our cognitive optimisation experiments.
I want to join the Awareness project.
